> Compute $C(5, 2)$ and check your answer by enumeration.

$$\binom{5}{2} = \frac{5 \cdot 4}{2!} = 10$$

The combinations are:

1. $\{1,2\}$
1. $\{1,3\}$
1. $\{1,4\}$
1. $\{1,5\}$
1. $\{2,3\}$
1. $\{2,4\}$
1. $\{2,5\}$
1. $\{3,4\}$
1. $\{3,5\}$
1. $\{4,5\}$
